@ Lord Red: 'Repack', in this instance, isn't relevant to your question. There was a problem with the audio sync, and EZ has upped this ver to address it (i'm assuming) - thus the 'repack' addition to the file name. The reason there are 117 files is because - oddly - it was compressed with winRAR. 

Get WinRAR (shareware, technically i think, but you can keep on using it - or get a crack). Install it. Click on the first file listed when you open the AoH folder. Choose your destination, and winRAR will take it from there.

And, while EZ is a trusted user with a long track record, and someone almost certainly would have already mentioned it if there were a problem, you need to get in the habit of scanning RARs before/after opening them (as with anything) to prevent infection.
Seeder count is dropping, so i guess that tends to support the 'still out of sync' comments, i s'pose.
